sen.j: 京都シネマ（きょうとシネマ）は、京都府京都市下京区四条烏丸にある映画館（ミニシアター）。
sen.e: Kyoto Cinema (a mini-theater) is located Shijo Karasuma, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Cinema (a mini-theater) is located in Shijo Karasuma, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Cinema (a mini-theater) is located in Shijo Karasuma, Shimogyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 如月社によって運営され、2004年12月4日に開館された。
sen.e: The cinema was opened on December, 4, 2004 and is operated by Kisaragisha.
The cinema was opened on December, 4, 2004 and is operated by Kisaragisha.
The cinema was opened on December 4, 2004 and is operated by Kisaragisha.

sen.j: 3つのスクリーンを有し、主に単館系映画を上映している。
sen.e: With three screens, it puts mostly films for independent cinemas on the screens.
With three screens, it puts mostly films for independent cinemas on the screens.
With three screens, it puts mostly films for independent cinemas on the screens.

sen.j: その2年前に2スクリーンを持つ京都朝日シネマが閉館したため、京都市内での単館系映画の上映が減少した。
sen.e: In two years before its opening, Kyoto Asahi Cinema with two screens was closed, reducing the opportunities to play films for independent cinemas in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In two years before its opening, Kyoto Asahi Cinema with two screens was closed, reducing the opportunities to play films for independent cinemas in Kyoto City.
In two years before its opening, Kyoto Asahi Cinema with two screens was closed, reducing the opportunities to play films for independent cinemas in Kyoto City.

sen.j: だが、旧京都朝日シネマのスタッフらが新たにできる商業施設で開館にこぎつけた。
sen.e: However, staff from Kyoto Asahi Cinema managed to open such a cinema in a newly built commercial facility.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, staff from Kyoto Asahi Cinema managed to open such a cinema in a newly built commercial facility.
However, staff from Kyoto Asahi Cinema managed to open such a cinema in a newly built commercial facility.

sen.j: 2006年に立命館大学と学術交流協定を締結した。
sen.e: In 2006, it concluded an academic exchange contract with Ritsumeikan University.
In 2006, it concluded an academic exchange contract with Ritsumeikan University.
In 2006, it concluded an academic exchange contract with Ritsumeikan University.

sen.j: 京都市下京区烏丸通四条下ル、COCON KARASUMA3階
sen.e: The third floor of COCON KARASUMA in Shijo-sagaru, Karasuma-dori Street, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The third floor of COCON KARASUMA in Shijo-sagaru, Karasuma-dori Street, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The third floor of COCON KARASUMA in Shijo Sagaru, Karasuma-dori Street, Shimogyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 阪急電鉄阪急京都本線烏丸駅側
sen.e: The Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Corporation: on the Karasuma Station side
The Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Corporation: on the Karasuma Station side
The Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Corporation: On the Karasuma Station side
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースをのぞくなどしました。
